mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_no, user_id, screening_id, seat_info, ticket_count, amount, status) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{screeningId}, #{seatInfo}, #{ticketCount}, #{amount}, #{status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE `order`
status = #{status}, pay_time = NOW(), cancel_time = NOW(),
WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND status = 0
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.seat_info, o.ticket_count, o.amount, o.status, m.id AS movieId, m.name AS movieName, m.cover AS movieCover, c.id AS cinemaId, c.name AS cinemaName, s.hall_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN screening s ON o.screening_id = s.id LEFT JOIN movie m ON s.movie_id = m.id LEFT JOIN cinema c ON s.cinema_id = c.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
SELECT order_no, user_id, screening_id, seat_info, ticket_count, amount, status, pay_time, cancel_time FROM `order` WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT o.screening_id, o.seat_info, s.col_count as ticketCount -- 作为中间量保存一下列数。。。 FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN screening s ON o.screening_id = s.id WHERE o.create_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND o.status != 2
